item.title: Pernix
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:4, topic:480719”]case ####: <-Item id

itemDef.modelid ^ model id

For the animations, that’s server side unless they require custom animations from a higher revision (like for a different attack style for weapons) but for armor generally you have to add the item id to the item class in its specific array like: body, helm, legs, etc.

This is what I assume you mean, I really don’t understand what your trying to say.[/quote]

I did that exactly, I added the model ids, but when you look at them in your inventory or in bank they look very weird, so I was wondering what else do I need to change ?

Read full topic

item.title: Pernix
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

case ####: <-Item id

itemDef.modelid ^ model id

For the animations, that’s server side unless they require custom animations from a higher revision (like for a different attack style for weapons) but for armor generally you have to add the item id to the item class in its specific array like: body, helm, legs, etc.

This is what I assume you mean, I really don’t understand what your trying to say.

Read full topic

item.title: Pernix
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

Hey guys, well I just downloaded a group of the new pernix models, and I was wondering, there are server anims\models in the inits? what do I change this all too in my 317 ? I dont really care about the gloves/boots just really care about the armour.

Here is what came in there the .rar I downloaded and I’m wondering what ##### I need to rename them too.

.rar file names:
pernixchestinv2
pernixfemale
pernixfemalechest
pernixfemalehelm
pernixfemalelegs
pernixglovesinv
pernixgloveswield
pernixhelminv
pernixlegsinv
pernixmaleboots
pernixmalechest
pernixmalehelm
pernixmaleinv
pernixmalelegs

Here are my itemdef ints:

	case 13355:
		itemDef.name = "Pernix cowl";
		itemDef.modelZoom = 800;
		itemDef.modelRotationY = 532;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 14;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1;
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1;
		itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
		itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges";
		itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
		itemDef.modelid = 62693;
		itemDef.anInt165 = 62739;
		itemDef.anInt200 = 62756;
	break;

	case 13354:
		itemDef.modelid = 62709;
		itemDef.name = "Pernix body";
		itemDef.description = "Pernix body";
		itemDef.modelZoom = 1378;
		itemDef.modelRotationY = 485;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 2042;
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = 7;
		itemDef.anInt165 = 62744;
		itemDef.anInt200 = 62765;
		itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
		itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges";
		itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
	break;

	case 13352:
		itemDef.modelid = 62695;
		itemDef.name = "Pernix chaps";
		itemDef.description = "Pernix chaps";
		itemDef.modelZoom = 1740;
		itemDef.modelRotationY = 504;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = 4;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = 3;
		itemDef.anInt165 = 62741;
		itemDef.anInt200 = 62757;
		itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
		itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges";
		itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
	break;
